author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Marsala Chicken With Pine Nuts & Sultanas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Marsala Chicken With Pine Nuts & Sultanas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 chicken pieces, such as thighs and breasts, skin on
1 handful fresh flatleaf parsley, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large castiron pan or casserole over a medium heat. Add the chicken pieces, and cook for about 8 minutes until golden all over. Remove from the pan, and set aside.

Reduce the heat to low. Add the onion, carrots, and celery to the pan, and sweat gently for a few minutes until soft. Pour in the Marsala, season with salt and black pepper, and simmer gently for about 30 minutes, topping up with water a little at a time if it begins to dry out  but don’t add too much because it should be fairly dry and the water will dilute the flavour.
Stir through the pine nuts, sultanas and cooked chicken. Cook for a few minutes more. Just before serving, stir through the parsley. Serve with a dressed green salad and fresh crusty bread.
